title: Master Arcanist Ziggs casts power word boom

replies.body: That's a pretty tiny Wizard.

IS THAT A SHORT JOKE?
{{champion:45}}

Yes.

A short response to a short joke.

IF LIGHT TRAVELS SO FAST, HOW COME ITS NEVER CALLED A NINJA?
{{champion:98}}
You mean caught?...
It's not the size of the Wizard, it's the magic in the hat trick.

{{champion:4}} Hey Ziggs why are you a wizard now?

{{champion:115}} Well I was inspired by a great wizard who taught me his secrets long ago.

Flash Back

{{champion:26}} Ziggs you have earned the rank of Master Arcanist and now can get the ladies.

{{champion:115}} Finally for all the hard work I have put in I now have an excuse for my bombs to use magic damage and have some game now.

End of Flash Back

{{champion:4}} That never happened at all did it.

{{champion:115}} No not all.

{{champion:4}} You just wanted an excuse to wear the wizard hat wasn't it.

{{champion:115}} Yes, but I still can get the ladies right.

{{champion:4}} Of course you can cause no lady can resist the hats.

Ziggs later got Evelynn on a date. Twisted Fate was not happy.

The end
blasphemy  we all know  {{champion:104}} X {{champion:4}}  is a thing and {{champion:28}} dumped {{champion:4}}
Wat about  {{champion:4}} X{{champion:104}} X{{champion:28}} ?
What about {{champion:17}} X {{summoner:14}} ?
What about Broke back midlane?{{champion:4}} x {{champion:157}}, They both have High Noon skins, the evidence is there.

>Then someone played wiffle ball with a smoldering orb of incineration...

So Thaaaaaaaat's what happened to the Institute of War.

Gotta say: I never thought they'd pin it on Ziggs.
This is the lore we've been craving for so long!
This skin is the bomb.
The ult is really cool
Pun intended?
This skin is actually really cool!
Too bad i dont play ziggs :P
Dammit im doing it again!
Alright, no more replying to myself, im done now!
Who are you?
RIP in peace rune paper Q. You were weird and totally unique, unlike any other skin. But Riot just had to get rid you... oh well. The new Q still looks sick. :D
... RIP in peace? So rest in peace in peace?
It's a joke, an old one at that. {{champion:26}}

As you are walking down a hall, you see a door at the end. You get closer, about to open the door, when a parchment attached to it catches your eye. You begin reading the note to yourself.

"I prepared Explosive Runes today."

This was the last thing you ever read.
Order of the Stick is awesome.
I've not played it. Do they make a similar reference in that?

Oh, derp, now I know what you guys are talking about. For some reason when I read that I was thinking of the South Park game, The Stick of Truth. Man I feel like an idiot. Yeah, the joke probably did come from there originally. Thanks guys.
It's a webcomic that runs on D&D rules. One character will occasionally leave a note saying "I prepared explosive runes today," so that is what I thought you were referencing.
Order of the Stick is a D&D webcomic, I am like, 90% sure the "I prepared explosive runes today" joke came from there to begin with.
They changed his Bouncing Bomb :(
yeah because it looked really dumb
I have to agree, having an orb looks much better than having a piece of paper floating towards someone with the physics of an orb. This feels much more natural.
i like that world of Warcraft reference
Personally, I took it as a D&D reference, but I suppose the idea to name the priest spells like that was borrowed from D&D.
Yup, looking at the D&D Players Handbook right now and D&D Wiki. Power Word spells originated in D&D.

R.I.P. My snow Ziggs skin

You shall be used only once in a blue moon on ARAM when I feel like an asshole throwing out white bombs on a white background

Community: "Riot, get on it, we need a new Ziggs skin!"

Riot: "*I'm going, I'm goinggg...{{champion:115}} *

not wearing deathcap 
riot i am dissapoint
I feel like this is a reference to Pat Rothfuss' Kingkiller Chronicles books.

For centuries, the archives stood as a shining beacon of the University's pride. Tomes and scrolls covered its towering walls, watching over generations after generations of scrivs as they memorized the layout of stacks and the customs of tomes. It was a bastion of knowledge the world thought would last forever.

Then an arcanist brought a candle into stacks.
yes! thank you. I am glad someone else was thinking it.
how about some taric love already!!!
taric shall forever have pizza feet

Anyone getting a "Hearthstone" vibe from this skin? The book in the top left part of the picture looks like the opening screen in hearth, and the title of this article contains "Power Word Boom", and there are cards that begin with "Power Word: xxxxx"? Just food for thought, the skin looks sick!
Power Word: Fortitude, Power Word: Shield, Power Word: Barrier, Power Word: Solace, Shadow Word: Pain, Shadow Word: Death are all from WoW.
D&D first but yeh
The Hearthstone cards come from World of Warcraft, and their method of naming priest spells like, "Word of Death," or, "Word of Power," came from Dungeons & Dragons
Power Word xxxx is what I meant lol. Was thinking of another game. Everything else is right except for the Word of power garbage
Let's hope the guild wasn't fairy tail, the guild hall has been destroyed enough times.
